message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will meet your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $20,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I agree the product is valuable,  your asking price is a bit high for my budget. I'd be willing to purchase the product for $10,000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $10,000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $17,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product brings to you.
I appreciate you working with me on the price, Alice.  $17,000 is still a bit outside my budget. Would you consider $12,000?

I understand that $12,000 is still a bit of a stretch for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $14,000. This is my best price, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
